seo.title: Sasha Suslova - UXI Designer
seo.description: Designer with a passion for the problem-solving approach and deep empathy for the user. I have over 3 years experience of designing IoT products, web design, analytics products and launching startups.
seo.keywords: designer ux ui user experience design branding web oleksandra aleksandra suslova sasha

aboutMe.title: Sasha Suslova
aboutMe.subtitle: UXI Designer
aboutMe.description: For the last 4 years working on desktop/mobile sites and applications design. Experienced in conducting design research, prototyping, usability testing and designing visually appealing, pixel perfect and user-friendly interfaces.

experience.title: UX/UI designer
experience.description: Designing user experiences for IoT products User interface design, prototyping and concepts with focus on user interactions. Delivering sitemaps, wireframes, flow diagrams and other materials

experience.title: UX/UI designer
experience.description: Designing user experiences for KaaIoT platform. Dashboard design, prototyping, marketing design.

experience.title: Founder
experience.description: Founder of backpacks, waist bags and sacks production business. Product design, social media marketing strategy, photo and video production. Web design. Brand design.

experience.title: Web design, Graphic design
experience.description: Web-sites design, design of packages, branding.

experience.title: Marketing designer/analyst
experience.description: Design of analytics products. Design of analytical reports and advertisement. Analysis of agricultural markets. Present the market overview and provide training sessions.

experience.title: Stock trader
experience.description: I've learned how to trade equities and how to use technical and fundamental analysis to make proper trading decisions. Traded stocks at Russian stock market.
